alert.note: Alert for Hughes; Jones; Stanley; Sully (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued April 03 at 8:17PM MDT until April 05 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM CDT /MIDNIGHT MDT/ TUESDAY TO 11 PM CDT /10 PM MDT/ WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 9 to 18 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Stanley, Sully, Hughes and Jones Counties. * WHEN...From 1 AM CDT /midnight MDT/ Tuesday to 11 PM CDT /10 PM MDT/ Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Strong winds could cause extensive damage to trees and power lines. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strongest winds will begin later than when snow starts and continue after the snow ends.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
